Chapter 2539 - Chapter 2539: Vermilion Tail Is In Danger (1)

Chapter 2539: Vermilion Tail Is in Danger (1)

Editor: Nyoi-Bo Studio

“Your subordinate has learned a lesson!”

Xi cupped his fists and bowed, sincerely convinced.

He had learned it. The only thing he was still puzzled about was, “Hallmaster Dao, have you already rewound the scene here before?”

“No,” Dao Qiongcang shook his head and said, “I am the same as you. I have just arrived here.”

“He was with me. I didn’t discover anything, but he found so much,” he thought.

Xi sighed. He had temporarily put aside the matter of the sound recording bead and only wanted to learn from Hallmaster Dao’s thoughts.

“There is still one thing that this subordinate does not understand.”

“Speak.”

“Since you didn’t know the real situation beforehand, how can you be sure that there’s a problem here?”

Dao Qiongcang looked at the young man with a burning light in his eyes. He did not want to say much, but he thought of his obsession with studying the Divine Secret when he was young.

“Bold speculation, careful verification.”

He seemed to be responding to her.

“I’m willing to hear the details.” Xi finally understood why so many of the elites of the Holy Mountain did not like to use their brains.

It smelled good!

Dao Qiongcang pondered momentarily and took out the three-finger-thick cover from his ring. It was a purple bra for women.

“This is one of the three items he left behind.”

“Yes.” Xi finally saw the actual appearance of this thing. As expected, Hallmaster Dao had kept one for himself.

Dao Qiongcang paced slowly under the night sky. “I gave you two. What conclusion did you come up with?” he asked slowly.

“The Southern Region’s evil technique has the aura of the satanic god. I’m guessing that the person who attacked is a Southern Region evil cultivator.”

“Is that all?”

“He dared to snatch someone from Hallmaster Dao. This person is audacious, but he is cautious. I guess he hasn’t reached the Saint Stage, the highest realm of the Higher Void State.”

“What else?”

“Uh, and… When higher void attacked, he was limited by the precision and range of his spell. A hundred miles is his limit. I speculate that this person is hiding within a hundred miles of the Southern Zone gate.”

“Pure hindsight!”

“Uh, yes, this is indeed the conclusion after the incident…” Xi was embarrassed and answered truthfully, Hallmaster Dao, I have no more guesses.”

Dao Qiongcang sighed and said in disappointment, “What you got was the usual conclusion that a person in your position with such resources could get, but it did not exceed it. In other words, you are not irreplaceable.”

Xi felt as if someone had stabbed him in the heart.

He could tell that even if a dog were tied up in the leader’s seat, it would get the same conclusion as him.

“I dare ask Hallmaster Dao, what else have I overlooked?” Xi was a little unconvinced but didn’t dare to show it. Dao Qiongcang had convinced him.

“I neglected the essence!” Dao Qiongcang pinched the soft cover in his hand and handed it over. “What did you see?”

“Uh…”

How can it be difficult to speak?

Dao Qiongcang glanced at him and laughed.

“This kind of item is made of high-quality materials, soft materials, and exquisite artistry. If placed in the Jade Capital City, it would also be a luxurious item of the upper class.”

“Even if you are still young and can’t come to such a conclusion, you should know from the logo that it is produced by the ‘Grand Palace’, which is specially used by the rich for fun.”

After a pause, Dao Qiongcang continued, “Purple corset, sexy style. Its outline is also big enough it’s difficult to hold it with one’s palm. I’ve done it before…”

“Yes, under normal circumstances, this item is only for women in their thirties or forties who are as ferocious as wolves and tigers in large families and sects.”

“If you’re a spirit cultivator master with a strong desire, you can push your age up a little.”

“Of course, we can’t rule out the possibility that there are some talented people who have achieved such a scale at such a young age. However, they still want to go further and show off even more.”

Xi’s face was flushed red as if he was about to explode with a pinch.

He was shocked and did not understand how Hallmaster Dao could say such dirty things so seriously.

Uh, experience?

“Dao, Hallmaster Dao Dao, so, so…?”

“So you’re shy and didn’t investigate this?” Dao Qiongcang’s expression was mocking. “Didn’t I not correct your evil thoughts and didn’t ask you not to investigate in that direction?”

Xi’s body stiffened.

That was why Hallmaster Dao had only given him the Arena imaging recording bead and did not point out that he had misunderstood his hobby…

There was such a meaning?

He still wanted him to follow the clues and investigate.

What could they find out?

Dao Qiongcang used his own experience to tell the young man in front of him that sometimes, he could get a lot of information even if he was not serious.

“A large faction must have a sect-protecting formation.”

“This person stole this item. This matter is small but big. At least there are no rumors of a rapist in Jade Capital City. However, this also indirectly shows one thing…”

“One thing?” Xi’s face was burning hot as he looked up in shock.

“The sect and clan protection array, the mansion and gate protection array, they are useless to this person.”

Xi suddenly felt like cold water had been poured over her head, and her burning face quickly cooled down.

He woke up with a start.

Again, he felt Hallmaster Dao’s meticulous thinking and realized that the subjective evasion of such unspeakable things was irresponsible for intelligence work.

When it came to intelligence, how could there be any innocence, justice, and filth?

“Please teach me!”

Xi bowed seriously, benefitting a lot.

On the one hand, Dao Qiongcang wanted to maintain his cold and aloof image as a Hallmaster. Still, he tried to laugh at the seriousness of the young man’s current topic and the fact that he did not want to be serious.

After hearing this, he almost couldn’t hold it in anymore. In the end, the corners of his mouth twitched twice, but he didn’t make a sound.
